guide.title: How to download videos
guide.introSubtitle: Just paste a link and download right away.

steps.copyBody: Copy the share link (URL) of the video you want to download.
steps.pasteBody: Paste the link into the Home input field and tap the DOWNLOAD button.
steps.qualityBody: Press Download on the quality/bitrate option you want to save.
steps.saveBody: Find saved videos in the ssdown album (gallery) or Downloads/ssdown folder.

language.chooseLanguage: Choose your preferred language to continue.
